title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Ads Creative Agent uses AWS to democratize ad creation (IND3335)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Ads Creative Agent 使用 AWS 实现广告创作民主化 (IND3335)
abstract: Media advertisers see up to 25% higher engagement when delivering custom creative to relevant audiences, yet producing quality video ads traditionally requires weeks of expensive and specialized expertise.** **Discover the inner workings of Amazon Ads new AI Creative Agent, and how it's transforming the creative process by automating and enhancing the generation of multi-format ads to businesses regardless of their size or creative expertise. Explore how Amazon Bedrock, custom-built ML models, GPUs, and model evaluations are used to orchestrate and generate compelling ad creatives into full video productions with professional voiceovers from conversational natural language, while reducing creative development time.
abstract_cn: 媒体广告商在向相关受众投放定制创意时，参与度最高可提升25%，然而传统的优质视频广告制作需要数周时间以及昂贵的专业技能。探索Amazon Ads全新AI创意代理的内部运作机制，了解它如何通过自动化和增强多格式广告的生成来改变创意流程，使各种规模和创意专业水平的企业都能受益。深入了解如何使用Amazon Bedrock、定制构建的ML模型、GPU和模型评估来编排和生成引人注目的广告创意，通过对话式自然语言将其转化为具有专业配音的完整视频作品，同时缩短创意开发时间。
